properties.name: jwt.provider.issuer-uri
properties.description: Uri for the defined JWT provider platform.

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key to generate JWT tokens. If left empty a random one will be generated.

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: Default expiration time for the generated token (in ms). If missing the default is 1h (3600000 ms).

properties.name: squip.frontend.url
properties.description: URL of the Squip frontend application. This is used to generate the correct
